column4: OK my internet connection is still repeatedly dropping. It must be the config on here. Anyone help?
wifi?
Yes, wireless router with dhcp server
I had a wireless router which did that all the time, I updated the firmware.. problem solved
check the logs, do "tail /var/log/messages" .. see what happens when it drops
yeah, it could give you a clue about what's happening.. it's probably either your router or your wifi driver, either case you're kind of bummed until a new driver/firmware comes out :/
then it might be your wifi controller.. do "lspci" and search for your wifi controller to see if someone else has problems
good luck, stuff like that is not fun.. it should "just work"
is it madwifi?
what driver then?
do "lsmod" see if you can find anything resembling a wifi driver, like e.g ath9k
then that's your wifi driver
check out this project: http://madwifi-project.org/
maybe they have a better/more recent driver
